CHANGE REQUEST
Title: Support for multi-terminal case in Push 2.2

front.note:
Public OMA Confidential
To: CD Push
Doc to Change:

Classification:
0: New Functionality
1: Major Change
2: Bug Fix
3: Clerical
Source: Bryan Sullivan, AT&T, bryan.sullivan@att.com
Shunan Fan, Huawei, fanshunan@huawei.com
Replaces: n/a
front.div:
To meet the requirements of Multi-terminal cases in Push 2.2
As for some cases, e.g. MMS, Push Email., the Push notification can not be sent to each of the user's terminal
for retrieving problem. PI may not be acknowledged of how many terminals the user's registered for this
application, because PI may use a user's identifier to send the Push message. PPG or SIP/IP core which have
the terminals registration information and terminal information may be responsible for choosing the right terminal
to send the Push message instead of sending it to all the terminals.
This CR is to clarify the multi-terminal situation and propose ways to guide how to handle multiple terminal
scenarios.
